shortdesc.ph: Used to configure custom audio track parameters.
Used to configure custom audio tracks.

plentry.pd:
Whether to enable local audio playback device:
: (default) Enable local audio playback.
: Do not enable local audio playback.

pd.note: This parameter takes effect only in AUDIO_TRACK_DIRECT mode for custom audio capture.
pd.ph: Whether to enable audio processing module:

ul.li: : Enable audio processing module, applying echo cancellation (AEC), noise suppression (ANS), and automatic gain control (AGC).
: (default) Do not enable audio processing module.

plentry.pd:
Whether to enable the local audio playback device:
: (Default) Enables the local audio playback device.
: Does not enable the local audio playback device.

pd.note: This parameter only takes effect for the AUDIO_TRACK_DIRECT type in custom audio capture.
pd.ph: Whether to enable the audio processing module:

ul.li: : Enables the audio processing module, applying echo cancellation (AEC), noise suppression (ANS), and automatic gain control (AGC).
: (Default) Does not enable the audio processing module.
